1.content: Josh wakes up after having a nightmare and immediately notices something is different. How will he recieve his swapping power?
1.title: The Beginning

info.brief_description: A teenage boy causes chaos when he finds a device that turns people into skin suits!
info.description:
My one rule is that your chapters should have proper grammar. Other than that, go crazy!

Main Characters:

Josh Snyder: Your average 16 year old boy. Light brown hair, a little on the chubbier side, likes video games. 5'10''

Katie Snyder: Josh's older sister (18y). Always hangs out with her friends and argues with Josh a lot. Blonde and slim waisted. 5'5''

Zach Snyder: Josh's older brother (20y). He's in college and only home some of the time. Very buff and fit as he was on the football team in highschool. Gets along with both Josh and Katie. He has dark brown hair and a bit of stubble. 6'4''

Helen Snyder: Josh's mother (48y). Although she's not as slim as she once was, Helen is still very fit and active. She always finds a way to spend time with her kids, and holds the family together. She has shoulder length blonde hair and is pretty petite at 5'1''.

James Snyder: Josh's father (50y). He is a gentle giant, and loves movie nights with the family. Very buff and toned for his age. Defense lawyer. 6'3''
